text:
Crazy expensive and dishonest. Took about a week to get my bike and gave me a shock when he quoted me the final price including “labour”. Wouldn’t mind paying but the lack of transparency and honesty is disappointing. If I was told the ACTUAL price BEFORE the job, would have definitely gone elsewhere. Quoted me one price prior to servicing, and charged me twice the quoted amount AFTER servicing the bike, saying it was the labour charge. Initially was told that the quoted amount was inclusive of labour. Upon picking up the bike, was told there was an additional labour charge which essentially amounted in me paying double the quoted amount. Lol.
Oh well, lesson learnt. Pick your workshops wisely. Go somewhere else. Cheers.
Bao is really honest and well versed and knowledgeable towards what he is doing. I would highly recommend!!! Best part he is open till late 11 pm and didn't take advantage of my situation.
Experience tech, late closing time, also open during weekend, best to call before visit if need to replace parts to save time waiting.
Regular customer for engine oil change as it's convenient for me to drop by after work. Mike is good and responsive. Reasonable price for repairing.
Great experience for my first visit! Ah Bao is honest and experience! Highly recommended!
